# GET /v1/ciWorkflows/{id}/relationships/repository | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/ciWorkflows/{id}/relationships/repository ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-relationships-repository)

-  GET /v1/ciWorkflows/{id}/relationships/repository 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/ciWorkflows/{id}/relationships/repository

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-relationships-repository#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/ciWorkflows/{id}/relationships/repository
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-relationships-repository#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-relationships-repository#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[CiWorkflowRepositoryLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/ciworkflowrepositorylinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-relationships-repository#see-also)

### [Getting Xcode Cloud Workflows](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-relationships-repository#Getting-Xcode-Cloud-Workflows)

[`Read Xcode Cloud Workflow Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_)Get information about a specific Xcode Cloud workflow.[`List All Xcode Cloud Builds for a Workflow`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-buildruns)List all builds Xcode Cloud performed for a specific workflow.[`Read the Repository Information for an Xcode Cloud Workflow`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-repository)Get information about the Git repository of a specific Xcode Cloud workflow.[`GET /v1/ciWorkflows/{id}/relationships/buildRuns`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-ciworkflows-_id_-relationships-buildruns)
